arts.ttl: Liverpool: Premier League explain 'really harsh' decision to disallow Virgil van Dijk goal vs Man City
arts.sum: Liverpool captain’s header against Manchester City was ruled out

arts.ttl: Roy Keane blames Liverpool star for Virgil van Dijk's controversial disallowed goal in Man City clash - as Micah Richards claims decision was 'harsh'
arts.sum: Van Dijk thought he had equalised for his side when he headed in Mohamed Salah's corner, only for the referee to blow up for an offside offence - which saw Robertson run in front of the goal.

arts.ttl: Premier League explains disallowed Virgil van Dijk goal as Liverpool left raging
arts.sum:
The Premier League Match Centre have issued a statement after Virgil van Dijk saw a goal ruled out for Liverpool away at Manchester City.

"#MCILIV – 38’ The referee's call of offside and no goal to Liverpool was checked and confirmed by VAR – with Robertson in an offside position and deemed to be making an obvious action directly in front of the goalkeeper."

arts.ttl: Man City v Liverpool team news: Cherki starts, Reijnders + Gakpo subs

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola Joins Sir Alex Ferguson, Arsene Wenger in Illustrious Club vs. Liverpool
arts.sum: The Manchester City boss received a message from Ferguson ahead of Sunday’s clash with Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Man City vs Liverpool LIVE: Rodri absent and Isak on bench in huge clash
arts.sum:

Liverpool XI: Mamardashvili, Bradley, Konate, Van Dijk, Robertson, Gravenberch, Mac Allister, Szoboszlai, Salah, Wirtz, Ekitike
